data.name: Settlement
data.note:
Lower Start possibly 1630, after loss of control by Bacalar or religious at Bacalar /v Gerhard 72
 Lower Start possibly 1642, after Raid of Bacalar by Diego el Mulato /v Bulmer 152
 Maybe buccaneering camps start date = Bay Islands more properly? [since were Eng colony under Hon in 1800s? uner Prov in 1638.]
 Possibly see [17 cent] Verapaz.
